page.title: 04BUSINESSES IN NORRISTHORPE
page.content: There is little{industry}in this 1km square (O.S. grid ref. 04200422). In fact, it consists of 1 garage, 3 general stores and 2 small businesses. The latter, however, are quite unusual for a small village. The larger of the 2 is a{soft toy factory}employing about 20 people, mostly women. The women spend most of their time sewing, stuffing and packing soft toys which are mostly sold at the seaside at prices ranging from 90p to Â£5. The other business is a{dog grooming {parlour}which does washing, shampooing and trimming. Its 2 main customers are poodles and Yorkshire terriers who are charged from Â£1 to Â£20. The 3 general stores include a{Post {Office}and an off-licence. They sell food, tinned and frozen, fresh vegetables, confectionery, household goods and tobacco.
